title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 576.4 - Self-created difficulty or economic injury
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 576.4 - Self-created difficulty or economic injury

State Regulations

The agency will not deny a variance, or refuse to consider
proof of significant economic injury, on the sole ground that the practical
difficulty or alleged economic injury is self-created. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
576.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
